articles.title: Tesla EV Battery Supplier CATL's Stock Soars After Largest Listing in 2025 - Investopedia
articles.description: Shares of Contemporary Amperex Technology Co., or CATL, soared more than 16% in their Hong Kong trading debut Tuesday after the Chinese electric vehicle battery maker raised more than $4.5 billion in the world's largest listing this year.
